## Education

* Ph.D. in Engineering, University of California, Irvine
* M.S. in Engineering, University of California, Irvine
* B.S. in Engineering, University of California, Irvine

* Executive Dean, College of Engineering, VCU
* Associate Dean, College of Engineering, Georgia Tech
* Associate Professor, School of Civil and Environmental Engineering, Georgia Tech
* Associate Professor, School of Civil and Environmental Engineering, Georgia Tech
* Interim Executive Director, State Road and Tollway Authority, Georgia
